query.mssql: select distinct databook.Id from dbo.{0} databook join dbo.Converter_Reference_Current cur on databook.Discriminator = cur.Discriminator and databook.Id = cur.Id where databook.discriminator = '{1}' and databook.XRecID is not null and (cur.{2} is null or cur.{2} = 0)
query.postgres: select distinct databook.id from public.{0} databook join public.converter_reference_current cur on databook.discriminator = cur.discriminator and databook.id = cur.id where databook.discriminator = '{1}' and databook.xrecid is not null and (cur.{2} is null or cur.{2} = false)

query.mssql: select distinct rec.Id from dbo.Sungero_Core_Recipient rec join dbo.Converter_Reference_Current cur on rec.Discriminator = cur.Discriminator and rec.Id = cur.Id where rec.discriminator = '{0}' and rec.XRecID is not null and (cur.ReSaved is null or cur.ReSaved = 0)
query.postgres: select distinct rec.id from public.sungero_core_recipient rec join public.converter_reference_current cur on rec.discriminator = cur.discriminator and rec.id = cur.id where rec.discriminator = '{0}' and rec.xrecid is not null and (cur.resaved is null or cur.resaved = false)

query.mssql: select distinct counterparty.Id from dbo.Sungero_Parties_Counterparty counterparty join dbo.Converter_Reference_Current cur on counterparty.Discriminator = cur.Discriminator and counterparty.Id = cur.Id where counterparty.discriminator = '{0}' and counterparty.XRecID is not null and (cur.ReSaved is null or cur.ReSaved = 0)
query.postgres: select distinct counterparty.id from public.sungero_parties_counterparty counterparty join public.converter_reference_current cur on counterparty.discriminator = cur.discriminator and counterparty.id = cur.id where counterparty.discriminator = '{0}' and counterparty.xrecid is not null and (cur.resaved is null or cur.resaved = false)

query.mssql: update dbo.Converter_Reference_Current set {0} = {1}, ReSavedErrorMessage = null where Id in ({2}) and Discriminator = '{3}'
query.postgres: update public.converter_reference_current set {0} = {1}, resavederrormessage = null where id in ({2}) and discriminator = '{3}'

query.mssql: update dbo.Converter_Reference_Current set {0} = 0, ReSavedErrorMessage = '{1}' where Id = {2} and Discriminator = '{3}'
query.postgres: update public.converter_reference_current set {0} = false, resavederrormessage = '{1}' where id = {2} and discriminator = '{3}'

query.mssql: select id from dbo.sungero_core_certificate ce where ce.discriminator = '{0}' and ce.notafter is null and ce.notbefore is null
query.postgres: select id from public.sungero_core_certificate ce where ce.discriminator = '{0}' and ce.notafter is null and ce.notbefore is null

query.mssql: select Id from dbo.Converter_Reference_Current where Discriminator = '{0}'
query.postgres: select id from public.converter_reference_current where discriminator = '{0}'

query.mssql: select Id from dbo.sungero_core_certificate ce where ce.discriminator = '{0}' and ce.notafter is null and ce.notbefore is null
query.postgres: select id from public.sungero_core_certificate ce where ce.discriminator = '{0}' and ce.notafter is null and ce.notbefore is null
